methodology: Online research of actual failures, post-mortems, production incidents

new_risks.title: Geographic Expansion Impossibility
new_risks.why_missed: Iterations 1-4 assumed linear scaling across cities. Didn't research Meetro/Wriggle failures.
new_risks.key_finding: Network effects in location apps DO NOT cross city boundaries. Success in Austin won't transfer to Nashville.
new_risks.real_world_evidence: Meetro: Hundreds of users in Chicago, zero in Milwaukee (100 miles away)
new_risks.financial_impact: $200K opportunity cost if expansion attempted prematurely

mitigation_strategy.expansion_criteria: 50K users, 80% market saturation, profitable before city #2

new_risks.title: Black Swan Event Vulnerability (Pandemic/Recession)
new_risks.why_missed: Recency bias (COVID was 'one-time event'). Assumed stable macro environment.
new_risks.key_finding: Event-dependent businesses extremely vulnerable to black swan events. 30% probability over 5 years.
new_risks.real_world_evidence: Wriggle: 400K downloads, $2M funding, shutdown 2022 due to pandemic. Never recovered.

mitigation_strategy.pivot_plan: 30-day pivot decision if DAU drops 30% sustained
mitigation_strategy.data_asset: Database worth $50K-200K even if business fails

new_risks.title: Meilisearch Hard Scale Limits
new_risks.why_missed: TECH-005 addressed search performance but assumed optimization would suffice. Didn't research architectural limits.
new_risks.key_finding: Meilisearch has HARD limit at 50-100M documents. No horizontal scaling. Requires 10x disk space.
new_risks.real_world_evidence: 116M document load failed at 38% (44M docs), 850GB disk, 2+ days
new_risks.failure_probability: 65% hit limit requiring migration by Year 3

mitigation_strategy.proactive_migration: Month 15 decision point - migrate before hitting limits
mitigation_strategy.dual_architecture: Run Meilisearch + Elasticsearch in parallel M12-18
mitigation_strategy.city_sharding: Separate index per city (5M total vs 50M limit)
mitigation_strategy.monitoring: Alerts at 80% safe limit, rebuild time >4hr, p95 >200ms

new_risks.title: GCP Billing Disaster
new_risks.why_missed: BUS-001 addressed infrastructure costs but assumed gradual increases. Trusted budget alerts (they don't work).
new_risks.key_finding: GCP budget alerts DON'T prevent spending. Billing data lags 24+ hours. Leaked credentials = $50K-$500K overnight.
new_risks.real_world_evidence: Milkie Way: $7 budget test → $72K bill overnight. Founder was ex-Google employee!
new_risks.failure_probability: 40% of experiencing billing incident in Year 1

mitigation_strategy.separate_account: GCP pulls from account with $5K limit only

new_risks.title: Supabase Realtime Production Readiness
new_risks.why_missed: TECH-004 addressed sync conflicts but not production scale. Assumed free tier sufficient.
new_risks.key_finding: Supabase free tier (50K MAU) insufficient for viral launch. Production launches require 2-week advance notice.
new_risks.real_world_evidence: Horizontal scaling broken (presence out of sync). Recent production instability. Hard quota enforcement.
new_risks.failure_probability: 60% of exceeding free tier or experiencing production issues

mitigation_strategy.proactive_upgrade: Start on Team plan ($25/mo), request 200K MAU quota pre-launch
mitigation_strategy.graceful_degradation: Fallback to 30s polling if Realtime fails
mitigation_strategy.hybrid_architecture: Realtime for critical only, polling for rest

new_risks.title: App Store Rejection - Background Location
new_risks.why_missed: MKT-008 addressed performance but not approval process. Didn't review Apple guidelines.
new_risks.key_finding: Background GPS tracking is PRIMARY rejection reason for location apps. Apple requires geofencing instead.
new_risks.real_world_evidence: 1.7M app rejections/year. Location apps face extra scrutiny on battery + privacy.

mitigation_strategy.design_for_approval: Use geofencing from Day 1 (not continuous tracking)
mitigation_strategy.geofencing_architecture: City-level geofences, max 20 monitored, prioritize by interest
mitigation_strategy.pre_submission_testing: TestFlight beta, battery testing, compliance checklist
mitigation_strategy.android_first: Optional - launch on Android first (more permissive)

new_risks.title: Event Ticketing Fraud Epidemic
new_risks.why_missed: SEC-002 addressed fraud but underestimated severity. Didn't research event ticketing fraud epidemic.
new_risks.key_finding: 12% of concert buyers scammed. $1.2B losses 2022. Fraud doubled since 2022. Event ticketing is HIGH-RISK.
new_risks.real_world_evidence: Organized fraud rings, stolen cards, chargeback fraud, fake events, phishing attacks
new_risks.failure_probability: 60% of Stripe suspension without enhanced prevention

mitigation_strategy.multi_layer_prevention: Phone verify, email verify, device fingerprinting (Sift $200/mo), velocity checks
mitigation_strategy.custom_risk_scoring: New account +30, first purchase >$50 +20, IP mismatch +40, threshold >70 = block
mitigation_strategy.post_purchase_monitoring: Track transfers, detect resales, flag suspicious behavior, Ethoca alerts
mitigation_strategy.organizer_verification: KYC, business verification, social proof, $500 deposit
mitigation_strategy.ticket_security: QR tied to phone, dynamic regeneration (60s), invalidate on chargeback, max 2 transfers
mitigation_strategy.chargeback_management: 24hr response, 50% win rate target, daily ratio dashboard
mitigation_strategy.insurance_reserves: 10% ticket revenue held 90 days, Sift $1M fraud guarantee, $25K capital reserve
mitigation_strategy.roi: Prevents 55% probability of business failure = $100K+ value

new_risks.title: Commission Rate Disintermediation Death Spiral
new_risks.why_missed: BUS-002 addressed unit economics but didn't model disintermediation risk.
new_risks.key_finding: High commissions drive users off-platform. eBay lost sellers to lower-fee platforms. 2.9% may be too low to be sustainable.
new_risks.real_world_evidence: Marketplaces fail when structural monopoly impossible. Competitive bidding erodes margins until no one makes money.
new_risks.failure_probability: 45% that commission model fails to achieve profitability

mitigation_strategy.diversified_revenue: Don't rely on ticketing alone - 4 streams (ticketing 40%, premium 30%, listings 20%, ads 10%)
mitigation_strategy.value_add_services: Marketing tools, analytics, premium placement (justify commission)
mitigation_strategy.anti_disintermediation: QR codes tied to platform, resale only through platform, ticket invalidation
mitigation_strategy.network_effects: Value increases with each user - can't disintermediate network
mitigation_strategy.monitoring: Track off-platform transactions, adjust rates if needed

additional_risks_identified.title: Founder Burnout
additional_risks_identified.description: 18-24 month grind to profitability. Solo founder or small team burning out before reaching break-even.
additional_risks_identified.mitigation: Co-founder support, mental health budget, realistic timeline expectations

additional_risks_identified.title: Key Person Dependency
additional_risks_identified.description: Single developer knows critical systems. If they leave or become unavailable, platform fails.
additional_risks_identified.mitigation: Two-developer minimum, documentation culture, backup developer retainer

additional_risks_identified.title: PostgreSQL VACUUM Requirements
additional_risks_identified.description: Performance degrades over time without regular VACUUM. Not mentioned in iterations 1-4.
additional_risks_identified.mitigation: Automated VACUUM schedule, monitoring for bloat, pg_repack if needed

additional_risks_identified.title: React Native Dev vs Release Performance Gap
additional_risks_identified.description: JavaScript thread performance MUCH worse in dev mode. Testing in dev mode misses production issues.
additional_risks_identified.mitigation: Always test performance in RELEASE builds, production-like staging environment

additional_risks_identified.title: Retention Worse Than Projected
additional_risks_identified.description: Industry average is 6% Day-30 retention (not 2.8% as initially stated). Target of 15% is 2.5x harder.
additional_risks_identified.mitigation: Daily utility design, gamification, push notifications, social features, AI personalization

additional_risks_identified.title: Content Moderation Personal Liability
additional_risks_identified.description: 40 new social media laws worldwide. Staff face personal liability for moderation failures.
additional_risks_identified.mitigation: AI moderation (Perspective API), human review, rapid response SLA, legal guidance

additional_risks_identified.title: GDPR Startup Targeting Increase
additional_risks_identified.description: €500K average GDPR fine. 750 companies fined in 2019 (1,000x increase from 2018). Startups increasingly targeted.
additional_risks_identified.mitigation: Privacy-by-design, explicit consent, 30-day retention, automated deletion, lawyer review

key_insights.most_dangerous_oversight: Geographic expansion impossibility - 75% probability of failure if attempted prematurely. Could destroy business.
key_insights.most_expensive_oversight: GCP billing disaster - $72K overnight bill possible. Trusted budget alerts that don't actually prevent spending.
key_insights.most_likely_to_occur: Event ticketing fraud epidemic - 80% probability. Industry fraud rate 12%, fraud doubled since 2022.
key_insights.most_underestimated: Meilisearch scale limits - Hard limit at 50-100M docs. No horizontal scaling. Requires $65K emergency migration.
key_insights.best_mitigation_roi: App Store rejection prevention - $12K investment prevents $32K emergency + launch delay.
key_insights.worst_mitigation_roi: Black swan insurance - $165K total cost, $56.5K expected value. But essential for survival.

roi_analysis.critical_note: Many risks are existential - ROI calculation understates value

residual_failure_probability.remaining_risks: Execution (founder capability, timing), Market (macro conditions), Luck (black swans)

immediate_actions: Commit to single-city focus for 12-18 months (not 6)
Implement GCP hard quotas and billing monitoring (Day 1)
Design for geofencing (not continuous background location)
Start on Supabase Team plan (not free tier)
Implement multi-layer fraud prevention (before first transaction)
month_12_decisions: Geographic expansion readiness assessment (likely: NOT ready)
accept_calculated_risks: Black swan events (30% probability, but $165K mitigation cost too high for bootstrap)
Competitor launches (10% probability, speed is best defense)
Some level of fraud (cannot prevent 100%, target <0.5% chargeback)

version_log.change_summary: Iteration 5 complete - 15 new risks discovered, 8 critical
version_log.notes: Identified major gaps: geographic expansion, GCP billing, fraud epidemic, Meilisearch limits
